text:
="preserve">Roy Edwards (May 27, 1954November 2, 2020) was an American politician. He was a member of the Republican Party. From 2015 until his death, he was a member of the Wyoming House of Representatives. Edwards was born in Gillette, Wyoming.
Edwards died in office on November 2, 2020 in Casper, Wyoming one day before his re-election date, aged 66.
